RESTUARANT / CAFE

UNIT 101

Long story short: we had some friends planning to open a cafe space here, but that fell through. The good news is that we have already taken care of a lot of the logistics. Permitting, Grease trap, backflow preventor, rough plumbing, power at the bar, etc... If you're looking to open a cafe then this could be the perfect space for you.

Our permitting is extremely flexible with a designated commercial kitchen and assembly areas so it's also well suited for a bar or small restaurant.

The space was designed to let in a large amount of indirect lighting so it's bright throughout the entire year. The corner of the building is an outdoor patio that can be used as is or covered for warm outdoor seating year round.

Address
